title: Distance Education-Based Elementary Social Studies Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Possession of elementary curriculum knowledge and foundational social studies concepts, with experience using online learning platforms
context.additional_context: Acquiring effective teaching methods for social studies in remote education environments for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain systematic design methods for key elementary social studies concepts (history, culture, geography) in remote education settings.
Learners develop two or more learner-engagement-focused social studies activities using digital collaboration tools.
Learners submit lesson designs that concretize blended strategies (remote and in-person education) through project-based assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
